text: Firstborn is a 1984 American psychological drama movie directed by Michael Apted and starring Teri Garr, Peter Weller, Corey Haim, Christopher Collet, Sarah Jessica Parker, Robert Downey Jr.. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1984 drama movies Category:1980s psychological movies Category:American drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Apted Category:Movies set in New Jersey
title: Firstborn (1984 movie)
